Pretty safe. Conduct drills every semester.
Any type, young and older alike!
Very affordable. Perfect option to save money taking general education classes before transferring to a more expensive university.
Clubs you can join and can conduct tours for new incoming students.
Decent food, but not that cheap (averaged priced)
I don't live on campus so really can't rate dorm life.
Not at all that stressful, but depends on the classes you take and on if you do the work.
Some/most teachers stress attendance a lot, so be there and be on time! Do the work and classes will be a breeze. If you need help and are struggling, there are plenty of people to help you.

Hawkeye Community College is a very nice college for students to get acclimated to new college life. Teachers are personable, classes are small (20 students average), courses aren't too rigorous (but depends on classes taken), and very much affordable. This school is perfect for students planning to take general education courses and transfer to a university and older non-traditional students alike.
pageTitle: Hawkeye Community College Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {41111=I happened to pick the Hawkeye Towers for my dorm. The Towers are a great place to live. The lease is for a year. You can live there for the summer if you wanted to and you can renew your lease. The rent as of right now (October 2012) is $385 with a $200 deposit when you first move in. Its not really a dorm if you think about it. Its more of an Apt complex. Your dorm is shared between 4 people. You get your own room that is 10x9. There are 2 bathrooms. 2 in each. The kitchen is fully functional. Its comes with a refrigerator, microwave, oven, and a dishwasher. The freezer is a little small. So you will have figure out spacing details with your roommates. The walls are a bit thin so if your neighbors are making really lowed noises you may here them. But otherwise not a bad place to live. The people working in the office are friendly and always willing to help., 98071=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC}

textAfterTable: Am enjoying being here I enjoy being at Hawkeye Community College because I love the fact that the teachers will always be willing to help you, no matter what the circumstances. Also, there are many different student activities to attend, making it easier to meet new people, or just have some fun in between your classes. There is such an enjoyable energy at Hawkeye Community College. I love the fact that everyone is friendly, and is willing to help you out if you feel that you need the help. The staff is friendly, and always willing to help you with your needs, making this friendly little college so enjoyable. Am learning a lot Hawkeye Community College is a great place to go if you want to learn a lot, on your own time. There are many different variations of classes you can take, and many different majors you can choose from. Just from walking from one class to the next, I feel that I have learned a lot, just from watching other people. There are so many different types of people attending this friendly college that you will most likely see all of your friends. All of the teachers here are very helpful, and love to take the time to help you out if you are not understanding what is going on in
